Race.SpecificTitle: Hospital Service District No. 1 -- 1% S&U - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Hospital Service District No. 1 Proposition
 (Sales & Use Tax Renewal)

Summary:  1% sales and use tax renewal for 10 years for paying costs associated with operating, maintaining and improving those facilities of the Abrom Kaplan Memorial Hospital related to providing emergency medical services.
Race.FullText: Shall Hospital Service District No. 1 of the Parish of Vermilion, State of Louisiana (the "District"), under the provisions of Section 2738.82 of Title 33 of the Louisiana Revised Statutes of 1950, as amended (R.S. 33:2738.82), and other constitutional and statutory authority, be authorized to levy and collect and adopt an ordinance providing for such levy and collection, a tax of one percent (1%) (the "Tax") (an estimated $1,011,885 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) upon the sale at retail, the use, the lease or rental, the consumption, and the storage for use or consumption, of tangible personal property and on sales of services in the District, all as defined by law, for a period of ten (10) years from April 1, 2011, with the proceeds of the Tax (after paying the reasonable and necessary expenses of collecting and administering the Tax), to be dedicated and used for the purpose of paying costs associated with operating, maintaining and improving those facilities of the Abrom Kaplan Memorial Hospital related to providing emergency medical services?
